track.strDescriptionEN:
"Levitating" is a song by English singer Dua Lipa from her second studio album Future Nostalgia (2020). The song was written by Lipa, Clarence Coffee Jr., Sarah Hudson and Stephen Kozmeniuk, with the production being handled by Kozmeniuk and Stuart Price. The song is a British dance, electro-disco, power pop, and space rock song, with a 1990s pop and R&B feel, with electronic influences and retro and 1980s elements. It includes a rap by Lipa, influenced by Blondie. Lyrically, the song has several outer space references and is about a love that is written in the stars.

"Levitating" received generally positive reviews from music critics, with many praising the production. Upon the release of Future Nostalgia, the solo version entered official charts in Greece, Hungary, Lithuania, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.

A remix of "Levitating" by The Blessed Madonna was released through Warner Records as the lead single from Lipa's first remix album Club Future Nostalgia: The Remix Album on 13 August 2020. The remix features additional songwriting and vocals from American singer Madonna and rapper Missy Elliott. It was accompanied by a music video directed by Will Hooper.
